name: Keyhole Spy: Frozen Hotties
description:
Is there anything that could warm you on the cold winter evenings better than hot babes? Keyhole Spy: Frozen Hotties has plenty of them, and for every taste! Beautiful girls will help you kill some time playing exciting mini games and, perhaps, they'll show you the most attractive sides of themselves.There are several stages of the game:
Match 3
First you need to set a beauty free from her ice cage! Align identical items in order to gradually “unfreeze” a girl.

Duel
As soon as you "warm" your lady, it will be time to heat her up in a battle against another girl! Draw a continuous line along the identical tiles on the field to strike a rival. Try to choose combinations that would do more damage on a particular opponent.

15 puzzle
And now it's time to warm up yourself. You'll be able to play 15 puzzle with the beauties who won at least one duel. The most skillful players will get to see the girls in all their glory gradually stripping them naked.
